title: Systematic Workshop for Shared Vision Development: A Scientific Approach to Organizational Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of fundamental organizational management concepts and teamwork experience
context.additional_context: Designed for learners in public science institutions needing to establish organizational development visions. Provides decision-making simulation experiences in a VR environment resembling real-world scenarios.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three core elements of an organizational vision framework: core values, future vision, and strategic objectives
Learners collaboratively perform a five-stage vision development process (problem diagnosis → idea convergence → vision drafting → feedback → finalization) with teammates using VR simulations
Learners can produce a shared vision document containing a concrete action plan for the organization as a project deliverable
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
